amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete $5 million appropriated for the Commerce Department's Under Secretary for Technology and Office of Technology Policy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to eliminate the Technology Administration's Under Secretary for Technology/Office of Technology Policy, resulting in $5 million in savings.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Allard amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 229 (Roll no. 347).
